testcase.name: US01 Login page must be accessible and user can enter datas validly or unvalidly
testcase.system-out: Given Environment must be accesable.........................................passed And Invalid username invalid password should not acces......................passed And Valid username invalid password should not acces........................passed And inValid username valid password should not acces........................passed Then Valid username valid password should acces succesfully.................passed

testcase.name: US02 Main Menu and subtitles must be executable
testcase.system-out: Given System Management must be accesible...................................passed And Hotel Management must be accesible......................................passed And Hotel List must be accesible............................................passed And Hotel Rooms must be accesible...........................................passed Then Room Reservations must be accesible....................................passed

testcase.name: US03 Hotel must be created
testcase.system-out: Given Navigate to Hotel List................................................passed And Hotel List must be accessible...........................................passed And Add Hotel must be executable............................................passed And Unsuccesful registration with invalid data..............................passed And Clear unsuccesful data..................................................passed And Succesful registration with valid data..................................passed And Navigate to Hotel List..................................................passed Then Check registered data on Hotel List....................................passed

testcase.name: US04 Hotel Room must be created.
testcase.system-out: Given Check that the Hotel Rooms link works.................................passed And Check that the Add Hotelroom button works...............................passed And When all the information is entered and the save button is pressed, the message has been saved successfully..passed And When the information to be entered is not entered, it is seen that it does not register when the save button is pressed..passed Then Verify that the entered information is displayed in the Hotel Rooms list.passed

testcase.name: US05 Reservation can be created
testcase.system-out: Given ROOM RESERVATIONS page must be accessible.............................passed And ADD ROOM RESERVATION must be executable.................................passed And User enters valid datas at Create Hotelroomreservation..................passed And Alert Box must be accessible............................................passed And Clear invalid data......................................................passed And User enters invalid datas at Create Hotelroomreservation................passed Then LIST OF RESERVATION must be accessible.................................passed

testcase.name: US06 User List Creation
testcase.system-out: Given user go to page.......................................................passed Given USER LIST page must be accessible.....................................passed Given ADD USER button must be executable....................................passed Given An User can not be added if all required datas is not entered validly..passed Given An User can be added if all required datas entered validly............passed Given Check if the Alert Box works..........................................passed Given Check if added users can be displayed on User List Table..............passed
